JFRC metadata tools 0.1 documentation

next | index

IntroductionÂ¶

Metadata tools is a package of Matlab based software components designed to help unify the handling of metadata. This package provides:

  1. a framework for defining metadata stucture via an XML based defaults tree,
  2. a mechanism for specifying validation criteria and default values for metadata,
  3. system of checks and queries to determine if all required metadata has been acquired,
  4. two different modes, “basic” and “advanced”, for metadata entry and validation,
  5. an automatically generated GUI dialog for user entry of metadata and
  6. a mechanism for saving the metadata, to an XML file, after it has been acquired.
